title: Nondeterministic(?) SIGSEGV&co. in CI

labels.name: A-spurious
labels.description: Area: Spurious failures in builds (spuriously == for no apparent reason)

body:
See #89167, getting lovely stuff like core dumps here:

<details>
<summary>x86_64 -> ppc64le dist fail, first couple of tries</summary>

